arts.ttl: Man Utd one transfer away from a ‘GREAT’ window: Rasmus Hojlund fate sealed in West Ham win
arts.sum: Man Utd one transfer away from a ‘GREAT’ window: Rasmus Hojlund fate sealed in West Ham win Manchester United might have beaten West Ham United 2-0 in a Saturday friendly, but for centre-forward Rasmus Hojlund it was a nightmare start to the pre-season campaign.

arts.ttl: What we learned from Man Utd's win over West Ham
arts.sum: Bruno Fernandes underlines his importance to Manchester United by scoring twice as they open their US pre-season tour with a 2-1 victory over West Ham in New Jersey.

arts.ttl: Why Bryan Mbeumo Didn’t Make Manchester United Debut vs West Ham
arts.sum: Bryan Mbeumo's absence from the Manchester United squad vs West Ham has been explained - while his planned debut date has been revealed.

arts.ttl: Six Man Utd stars impress Ruben Amorim as manager given transfer headache after West Ham win
arts.sum: Manchester United are understood to be eyeing up a new striker but Rasmus Hojlund was among six stars who impressed for Ruben Amorim in the club's win over West Ham

arts.ttl: He is our leader – Ruben Amorim hails Bruno Fernandes after win over West Ham
arts.sum: New signing Bryan Mbeumo was not part of the squad.

arts.ttl: Why Bryan Mbeumo didn't play a single minute in Man Utd win against West Ham
arts.sum: Manchester United's shiny new £71 million acquisition from Brentford didn't feature in the club's first pre-season test in the United States against West Ham

arts.ttl: Man Utd Player Ratings vs. West Ham: Red Devils Open Summer Series With 2-1 Win
arts.sum: Rasmus Højlund, handed a start up top with Bruno Fernandes and summer signing Matheus Cunha playing in the pockets behind him, nearly sent the Man Utd support at MetLife Stadium into a frenzy in the opening minutes. Man Utd looked the sharper team in attack for the opening 20 minutes as Matheus Cunha, Fernandes and Højlund linked up around the edge of the box.

arts.ttl: Fernandes leads Man Utd past West Ham in N.J.
arts.sum: Manchester United kicked off their preseason tour of the U.S. with a 2-1 win over West Ham at MetLife Stadium on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Fernandes nets double as Man Utd beat West Ham
arts.sum: Bruno Fernandes scored twice as Manchester United grabbed their first win of pre-season with a 2-1 victory over West Ham in the Summer Series.

arts.ttl: Bruno Fernandes remains the top dog at Man United despite £130m arrivals, Rasmus Hojlund shows he's ready for a fight and the one area Red Devils must improve - SIX THINGS WE LEARNED from 2-1 win over West Ham
arts.sum: Manchester United may have spent more than £130million on Bryan Mbeumo and Matheus Cunha this summer, but Bruno Fernandes won't give up his status as the main man easily.
